question: Which of the following launched its first large-scale electric car-sharing programme?
explanation: Singapore launched its first large-scale electric car-sharing programme to provide commuters with more transport options and steer them away from the need to buy their own cars. It aims to roll out a fleet of 1,000 electric vehicles and 2,000 charging points by 2020. BlueSG said Singapore's service will become the world's second-biggest electric car-sharing programme after Paris.
